cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic 2 Bed Tent Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Rustic tent like structure with a glass roof to gaze at the stars. Shared facilities with Te Nikau Lodge / Te Ruru Lodge. 
No electricity. From the car park it\'s a two minute walk through the rainforest to your accommodation.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A standard double room in a character lodge with fully made up beds and home comforts. Shared kitchen, bathroom and lounge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Queen bed with ensuite bathroom. Shared kitchen, 
lounge and cosy fireplace. Freshly baked bread and brownies 
baked on a daily basis for sale in this timber home away from home. 
2 person maximum.

Deposit only
